amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete language which authorizes funds for military construction projects related to the Global War on Terrorism.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike the section on the Global War on Terrorism.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sanchez, Loretta amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 128 - 295 (Roll no. 552).
